import { useState } from 'react'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; // Import the js-cookie library function SectionCanEducation() { // Handle input changes const handleSave = async () => { if (!education.educationType || !education.course || !education.university) { alert('Please fill in all the fields.'); return; } // Fetch userId from cookies const userId = Cookies.get('candidateId'); // Replace 'userId' with your cookie name if different if (!userId) { alert('User ID not found. Please log in again.'); return; } try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/resumeHeadline', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ userId, educationCategory: education.educationType, course: education.course, university: education.university, }), credentials: 'include', }); const data = await response.json(); if (response.ok) { console.log(response) alert('Education details saved successfully!'); } else { console.error('Server responded with:', data); alert(data.message || 'Error saving education details'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error:', error); alert('Error saving education details'); } }; return ( <>
